data.description: Significant Price Improvement + $10,000 Towards Buyer's Closing Costs! Nestled on a quiet cul-de-sac in a fantastic West End location. Conveniently situated close to highways, shopping, and all the amenities you could desire, this residence offers a spacious yard with mature trees. This 4-bed, 2.5-bath home exudes classic charm. The hardwood floors amplify the inviting atmosphere, complemented by a cozy fireplace that adds warmth and character. A dedicated dining room provides an ideal setting for gatherings, while the eat-in kitchen offers everyday comfort. The convenience of larger bedrooms, one on the first-floor, adds flexibility to the well-designed floorplan. Schedule your showing today!
